from Crypto.Util.number import *
import random
import hashlib

a=[getPrime(96) for _ in range(48)]
p=random.getrandbits(48)
assert len(bin(p)[2:])==48
flag='hgame{'+hashlib.sha256(str(p).encode()).hexdigest()+'}'

bag=0
for i in a:
    temp=p%2
    bag+=temp*i
    p=p>>1

print(f'a={a}')
print(f'bag={bag}')

"""
